uk.co.crider.jablus

Class Simulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.crider.jablus.data.CompoundData
      • uk.co.crider.jablus.Simulation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, Data, DataSet, EnvironmentInterface, SimulationInterface

    public class Simulation
extends CompoundData
implements EnvironmentInterface, SimulationInterface
    Top level object, 1-instance per simulation. Provides access to LandUseEnv and GUI objects. Agents and user interfaces should not make direct reference to this object. Instead use EnvironmentInterface for agents and SimulationInterface for user interfaces
    See Also:
    EnvironmentInterface, SimulationInterface
